channel.title: Helpp for server
channel.description:
The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
can some one give me link for this
what kind i supposed to download jdk or jre?

item.title: Helpp for server
item.dc:creator: @FWTV_Pain FWTV_Pain
item.description:
@FWTV_Pain wrote:

[quote=“FWTV_Pain, post:2, topic:371394”]is this for the compiler or when u run the server?

if its the compiler u need to: (i did not make this compiler i dont want to take credit for it)

  1. Right click, edit on the compiler.text
  2. highlight all text in it
  3. copy and paste the below Code
  4. save and exit
  5. try the compile now?

echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Hope i helped :)[/quote]

In my code compiler, theres java weblink address click that it will take u to the site to download the JDK and/or the Jre

Read full topic

item.title: Helpp for server
item.dc:creator: @FWTV_Pain FWTV_Pain
item.description:
@FWTV_Pain wrote:

is this for the compiler or when u run the server?

if its the compiler u need to: (i did not make this compiler i dont want to take credit for it)

  1. Right click, edit on the compiler.text
  2. highlight all text in it
  3. copy and paste the below Code
  4. save and exit
  5. try the compile now?

echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Hope i helped
